functions.name: memorize
functions.description: Cast a memory spell to preserve your current desktop realm with all mystical windows and ethereal browser tabs

realm_name.description: The mystical name for this preserved realm

functions.name: recall
functions.description: Summon a previously memorized realm back from the ethereal plane, restoring all windows and tabs

realm_name.description: The name of the realm to summon forth

functions.name: grimoire
functions.description: Consult the mystical grimoire to view all memorized realms and their arcane details

functions.name: snapshot
functions.description: Instantly crystallize the current realm with a time-stamped enchantment

functions.name: timeshift
functions.description: Warp through the temporal vortex to your most recently memorized realm

functions.name: vanish
functions.description: Memorize the current realm then cast a vanishing spell on all windows for a pristine desktop

functions.name: shroud
functions.description: Memorize the current realm then cast a shrouding veil to conceal all windows
